response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which holds significant value for us at $15,000. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I believe we can come to an agreement that respects both our interests. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to discuss how we can make this transaction beneficial for both parties.", "product_price": 12000}
